productName: Apple Macbook Pro Core i9 9th Gen. 16GB RAM 1TB SSD 16" Laptop - Space Grey
description: Apple M1 Pro chip for a massive leap in CPU, GPU, and machine learning performance
Up to 10-core CPU delivers up to 2x faster performance to fly through pro workflows quicker than ever
Up to 32-core GPU with up to 4x faster performance for graphics-intensive apps and games
16-core Neural Engine for 5x faster machine learning performance
Longer battery life, up to 21x hours
16GB of unified memory so everything you do is fast and fluid
1 TB superfast SSD storage launches apps and opens files in an instant
16-inch Liquid Retina XDR, the most advanced pro notebook display ever
1080p FaceTime HD camera with advanced image signal processor for sharper video calls
Touch ID for secure unlock and payments
macOS Monterey lets you connect, share, and create like never before, with exciting new FaceTime updates and a redesigned Safari
